Detailed Description

Encapsulates a property. The PropertyItem can be used for GUI controls.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN PropertyItem::Execute (   )  [virtual]
 

The property-providing application is posted a PropertyTriggerMsg. If the property editor factory is not able to handle the property, the particular application must handle the property itself.

Reimplemented from FeatureItem.

Initializes the instance by reading out a resource file generated by ARAGON. This method may not be invoked by the MMI in a direct manner and might be changed in future releases.
